mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (product_name, product_contents1, product_contents2, product_contents3, product_img, product_thumb_img) VALUES (#{productName}, #{productContents1}, #{productContents2}, #{productContents3}, #{productImg}, #{productThumbImg})
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET product_name = #{productName}, product_contents1 = #{productContents1}, product_contents2 = #{productContents2}, product_contents3 = #{productContents3} WHERE product_seq = #{productSeq};
UPDATE product SET product_views = product_views+1 WHERE product_seq = #{productSeq};
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product_reply WHERE product_seq = #{productSeq} AND reply_seq = #{replySeq}
SELECT ifnull(max(reply_seq),0) data FROM product_reply where product_seq = #{productSeq}
SELECT ifnull(min(reply_seq),0) data FROM product_reply where product_seq = #{productSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_reply (product_seq, reply_writer, reply_contents) VALUES (#{productSeq}, #{replyWriter}, #{replyContents})
